comment._content: This pic is taken at Gravelly Point Park in Arlington, VA. We'd love to have it added to the group Arlington, VA before 1990.

comment.author: 41036814@N00
comment._content:
One of my favorite spots in the world (unashamed city boy) from my childhood - remember biking there many times from my parents' home in Ballston.

Even though we live a couple of hours away, I have taken my kids there several times over the years.

comment._content: must be a real wide bike path.
